GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/users.description: serves up an array of all users

GET /api/users/:user_id.description: serves up single user by user_id

GET /api/events.description: serves up an array of all events

topics.title: Tech Conference 2025
topics.description: A conference discussing the latest trends in technology and software development.
topics.address: Moscone Center, 747 Howard St, San Francisco, CA 94103, USA

GET /api/events/:event_id.description: serves up single event by event_id

topics.title: Tech Conference 2025
topics.description: A conference discussing the latest trends in technology and software development.
topics.address: Moscone Center, 747 Howard St, San Francisco, CA 94103, USA

GET /api/users/registered/:event_id.description: serves up all registered users event_id

GET /api/staff.description: serves up an array of all staff

GET /api/staff/:staff_id.description: serves up singel staff object by staff_id

POST /api/events/:created_by.description: adds an event and returns event object

exampleResponse.title: Tech Conference 2025
exampleResponse.description: A conference discussing the latest trends in technology and software development.
exampleResponse.address: Moscone Center, 747 Howard St, San Francisco, CA 94103, USA

PATCH /api/events.description: Updates an event and returns event object

exampleResponse.title: Tech Conference 2025
exampleResponse.description: A conference discussing the latest trends in technology and software development.
exampleResponse.address: Moscone Center, 747 Howard St, San Francisco, CA 94103, USA

POST /api/registration.description: Adds a user registration to event and returns registration objet

PATCH /api/registration.description: Updates a user registration to event and returns registration objet
